contentrichtext.text: {{redirect-distinguish|Except|Accept (disambiguation){{!}}accept}} {{wiktionary|exception}} '''Exception''' or '''exceptions''' may refer to: * An [[Action (philosophy)|action]] that is not part of ordinary operations or standards * [[Exception handling]], in programming languages ** or a programming [[interrupt]] itself, meant to be dealt with by exception handling. * [[Exception (song)]], the second single from Ana Johnsson's second album ''Little Angel'' * [[Exceptional Records]] * [[The Exceptions]], a German demo (computer art) group {{disambiguation}}
